spec_data.Name: freedoom-freedm
spec_data.Description:
Freedoom: FreeDM is a 32-level Doom styled first person shooter
game designed for competitive deathmatch play.

Freedoom: FreeDM uses all Free as in freedoom content combined with
the Open Source Doom engine.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:04:15 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Doom styled first person shooter deathmatch game
